author: ab
msg: * fix breakage - couldn't write to already existing subdirectory. Now
output directory is specified in arguments.
* add functionality to retrieve individual records
* add functionality to list segment overviews
* add options to limit the reader's output to specified segment data.
Please see synopsis for more details.

author: gnodet
msg: ActivationSpec should not override the endpoint defined in component if no service is defined on the activation spec

author: jboynes
msg: loader registry and assembly factory are now regular system components and do not need special handling
